00031     SDLInput::SDLInput()
00032     {
00033     }
00034 
00035     SDLInput::~SDLInput()
00036     {
00037         SDL_ShowCursor(1);
00038     }
00039 
00040     void SDLInput::initialise(RenderWindow* pWindow, bool useKeyboard, bool useMouse, bool useGameController)
00041     {
00042         // Hide the cursor
00043         SDL_ShowCursor(0);
00044 
00045         // Get the center and put the mouse there
00046         int width, height, depth, left, top;
00047         pWindow->getMetrics(width, height, depth, left, top);
00048 
00049         mMouseCenterX = width / 2;
00050         mMouseCenterY = height / 2;
00051 
00052         SDL_WarpMouse(mMouseCenterX, mMouseCenterY);
00053 
00054         
00055         // XXX Anything to do?
00056     }
00057 
00058     void SDLInput::capture()
00059     {
00060         SDL_PumpEvents();
00061 
00062         // Get Keyboard state
00063         mKeyboardBuffer = SDL_GetKeyState(NULL);
00064 
00065         // Get mouse info
00066         if( SDL_GetAppState() & SDL_APPMOUSEFOCUS )
00067         {
00068             mMouseKeys = SDL_GetMouseState( &mMouseX, &mMouseY );
00069             SDL_WarpMouse( mMouseCenterX, mMouseCenterY );
00070         }
00071 
00072         // XXX Fix me up
00073         // Game controller state
00074     }
00075 
00076     bool SDLInput::isKeyDown(KeyCode kc)
00077     {
00078         case KC_ESCAPE:
00079             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_ESCAPE];
00080         case KC_1:
00081             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_1];
00082         case KC_2:
00083             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_2];
00084         case KC_3:
00085             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_3];
00086         case KC_4:
00087             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_4];
00088         case KC_5:
00089             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_5];
00090         case KC_6:
00091             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_6];
00092         case KC_7:
00093             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_7];
00094         case KC_8:
00095             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_8];
00096         case KC_9:
00097             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_9];
00098         case KC_0:
00099             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_0];
00100         case KC_MINUS:  /* - on main keyboard */
00101             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_MINUS];
00102         case KC_EQUALS:
00103             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_EQUALS];
00104         case KC_BACK:  /* backspace */
00105             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_BACKSPACE];
00106         case KC_TAB:
00107             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_TAB];
00108         case KC_Q:
00109             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_q];
00110         case KC_W:
00111             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_w];
00112         case KC_E:
00113             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_e];
00114         case KC_R:
00115             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_r];
00116         case KC_T:
00117             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_t];
00118         case KC_Y:
00119             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_y];
00120         case KC_U:
00121             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_u];
00122         case KC_I:
00123             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_i];
00124         case KC_O:
00125             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_o];
00126         case KC_P:
00127             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_p];
00128         case KC_LBRACKET:
00129         case KC_RBRACKET:
00130             break;
00131         case KC_RETURN: /* Enter on main keyboard */
00132             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_RETURN];
00133         case KC_LCONTROL:
00134             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_LCTRL];
00135         case KC_A:
00136             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_a];
00137         case KC_S:
00138             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_s];
00139         case KC_D:
00140             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_d];
00141         case KC_F:
00142             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_f];
00143         case KC_G:
00144             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_g];
00145         case KC_H:
00146             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_h];
00147         case KC_J:
00148             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_j];
00149         case KC_K:
00150             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_k];
00151         case KC_L:
00152             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_l];
00153         case KC_SEMICOLON:
00154         case KC_APOSTROPHE:
00155         case KC_GRAVE:  /* accent grave */
00156             break;
00157         case KC_LSHIFT:
00158             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_LSHIFT];
00159         case KC_BACKSLASH:
00160             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_BACKSLASH];
00161         case KC_Z:
00162             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_z];
00163         case KC_X:
00164             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_x];
00165         case KC_C:
00166             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_c];
00167         case KC_V:
00168             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_v];
00169         case KC_B:
00170             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_b];
00171         case KC_N:
00172             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_n];
00173         case KC_M:
00174             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_m];
00175         case KC_COMMA:
00176             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_COMMA];
00177         case KC_PERIOD: /* . on main keyboard */
00178             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_PERIOD];
00179         case KC_SLASH: /* '/' on main keyboard */
00180             break;
00181         case KC_RSHIFT:
00182             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_RSHIFT];
00183         case KC_MULTIPLY: /* * on numeric keypad */
00184             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP_MULTIPLY];
00185         case KC_LMENU: /* left Alt */

00187         case KC_SPACE:

00200             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F5];
00201         case KC_F6:
00202             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F6];

00204             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F7];
00205         case KC_F8:
00206             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F8];
00207         case KC_F9:
00208             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F9];

00210             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F10];
00211         case KC_NUMLOCK:
00212             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_NUMLOCK];

00214             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_SCROLLOCK];
00215         case KC_NUMPAD7:

00219         case KC_NUMPAD9:

00221         case KC_SUBTRACT: /* - on numeric keypad */
00222             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP_MINUS];
00223         case KC_NUMPAD4:
00224             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP4];
00225         case KC_NUMPAD5:
00226             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP5];
00227         case KC_NUMPAD6:
00228             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP6];
00229         case KC_ADD: /* + on numeric keypad */
00230             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP_PLUS];
00231         case KC_NUMPAD1:
00232             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP1];
00233         case KC_NUMPAD2:
00234             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP2];
00235         case KC_NUMPAD3:
00236             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP3];
00237         case KC_NUMPAD0:
00238             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP0];
00239         case KC_DECIMAL:  /* . on numeric keypad */
00240             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP_PERIOD];
00241         case KC_OEM_102:  /* < > | on UK/Germany keyboards */
00242             break;
00243         case KC_F11:
00244             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F11];
00245         case KC_F12:
00246             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F12];
00247         case KC_F13: /* (NEC PC98) */
00248             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F13];
00249         case KC_F14: /* (NEC PC98) */
00250             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F14];
00251         case KC_F15: /* (NEC PC98) */
00252             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_F15];
00253         case KC_KANA: /* (Japanese keyboard) */
00254         case KC_ABNT_C1: /* / ? on Portugese (Brazilian) keyboards */
00255         case KC_CONVERT: /* (Japanese keyboard) */
00256         case KC_NOCONVERT: /* (Japanese keyboard) */
00257         case KC_YEN: /* (Japanese keyboard) */
00258         case KC_ABNT_C2: /* Numpad . on Portugese (Brazilian) keyboards */
00259             break;
00260         case KC_NUMPADEQUALS: /* = on numeric keypad (NEC PC98) */
00261             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP_EQUALS];
00262         case KC_PREVTRACK: /* Previous Track (KC_CIRCUMFLEX on Japanese keyboard) */
00263         case KC_AT: /* (NEC PC98) */
00264         case KC_COLON: /* (NEC PC98) */
00265         case KC_UNDERLINE: /* (NEC PC98) */
00266         case KC_KANJI: /* (Japanese keyboard)            */
00267         case KC_STOP: /* (NEC PC98) */
00268         case KC_AX:  /*  (Japan AX) */
00269         case KC_UNLABELED:  /* (J3100) */
00270         case KC_NEXTTRACK:  /* Next Track */
00271         case KC_NUMPADENTER:  /* Enter on numeric keypad */
00272         case KC_RCONTROL:
00273         case KC_MUTE:  /* Mute */
00274         case KC_CALCULATOR:  /* Calculator */
00275         case KC_PLAYPAUSE:  /* Play / Pause */
00276         case KC_MEDIASTOP:  /* Media Stop */
00277         case KC_VOLUMEDOWN:  /* Volume - */
00278         case KC_VOLUMEUP:  /* Volume + */
00279         case KC_WEBHOME:  /* Web home */
00280         case KC_NUMPADCOMMA:  /* , on numeric keypad (NEC PC98) */
00281             break;
00282         case KC_DIVIDE:  /* / on numeric keypad */
00283             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_KP_DIVIDE];
00284         case KC_SYSRQ:
00285             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_SYSREQ];
00286         case KC_RMENU:  /* right Alt */
00287             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_RALT];
00288         case KC_PAUSE:  /* Pause */
00289             break;
00290         case KC_HOME:  /* Home on arrow keypad */
00291             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_HOME];
00292         case KC_UP:  /* UpArrow on arrow keypad */
00293             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_UP];
00294         case KC_PGUP:  /* PgUp on arrow keypad */
00295             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_PAGEUP];
00296         case KC_LEFT:  /* LeftArrow on arrow keypad */
00297             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_LEFT];
00298         case KC_RIGHT:  /* RightArrow on arrow keypad */
00299             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_RIGHT];
00300         case KC_END:  /* End on arrow keypad */
00301             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_END];
00302         case KC_DOWN:  /* DownArrow on arrow keypad */
00303             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_DOWN];
00304         case KC_PGDOWN:  /* PgDn on arrow keypad */
00305             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_PAGEDOWN];
00306         case KC_INSERT:  /* Insert on arrow keypad */
00307             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_INSERT];
00308         case KC_DELETE:  /* Delete on arrow keypad */
00309             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_DELETE];
00310         case KC_LWIN:  /* Left Windows key */
00311             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_LSUPER];
00312         case KC_RWIN:  /* Right Windows key */
00313             return mKeyboardBuffer[SDLK_RSUPER];
00314         case KC_APPS:  /* AppMenu key */
00315         case KC_POWER:  /* System Power */
00316         case KC_SLEEP:  /* System Sleep */
00317         case KC_WAKE:  /* System Wake */
00318         case KC_WEBSEARCH:  /* Web Search */
00319         case KC_WEBFAVORITES:  /* Web Favorites */
00320         case KC_WEBREFRESH:  /* Web Refresh */
00321         case KC_WEBSTOP:  /* Web Stop */

00323         case KC_WEBBACK:  /* Web Back */
00324         case KC_MYCOMPUTER:  /* My Computer */
00325         case KC_MAIL:  /* Mail */
00326         case KC_MEDIASELECT:  /* Media Select */
00327             break;
00328         default:
00329             break;
00330     }
00331 
00332     int SDLInput::getMouseRelativeX()
00333     {
00334         return mMouseX - mMouseCenterX;
00335     }
00336 
00337     int SDLInput::getMouseRelativeY()
00338     {
00339         return mMouseY - mMouseCenterY;
00340     }
00341 }
